required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Heart Rate and Respiratory Rate Measurements by a Novel, Radar-based Device
clinical_study.official_title: Single Center, Single Blinded, Prospective Validation Study for the Accuracy and Safety Evaluation of Neteera 130H, a Novel, Radar-based Contact-free Device for Heart and Respiratory Rate Measurements

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Single center, single blinded, prospective validation study for the accuracy and safety evaluation of Neteera 130H, a novel, radar-based contact-free device for heart and respiratory rate measurements compared to reference devices and manual measurements. For the purpose of this study, up to 100 eligible subjects, 18 years old and above will be enrolled for a single study visit in which the subjects will be screened and upon eligibility confirmation, will undergo HR and RR measurements using the investigational device as well as the reference devices. RR will also be measured manually by the site staff.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of accurate spot HR while the Neteera 130H located behind the subject.
primary_outcome.time_frame: During 60 seconds, from t = 0:00 min to t = 1:00
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of accurate spot HR (BPM) measurements of the investigated device, while located behind the subject, compared to the reference device measurement.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of accurate spot RR while the Neteera 130H located behind the subject.
primary_outcome.time_frame: During 60 seconds, from t = 0:00 min to t = 1:00
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of accurate spot RR (BrPM) measurements of the investigated device, while located behind the subject, compared to staff manual measurement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of accurate spot RR measurements while the Neteera 130H compared to staff manual measurement.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During 60 seconds, from t = 0:00 min to t = 1:00
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of accurate spot RR (BrPM) measurements of the investigated device, while located in front of the subject, compared to staff manual measurement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of accurate spot RR measurements of Neteera 130H compared to the reference device measurements.
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of accurate spot RR (BrPM) measurements of the investigated device, while located behind or in front of the subject, compared to the reference device measurements.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of accurate continuous HR measurements of Neteera 130H compared to the reference device measurements.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During 5 minutes of the continuous measurement
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of accurate continuous HR (BPM) measurements of the investigated device, while located behind or in front of the subject, compared to the reference device measurements.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of accurate continuous RR measurements of Neteera 130H compared to the reference device measurements.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During 5 minutes of the continuous measurement
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of accurate continuous RR (BrPM) measurements of the investigated device, while located behind or in front of the subject, compared to the reference device measurements.

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of accurate spot HR measurements of Neteera 130H compared to the reference device measurements.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During 60 seconds, from t = 0:00 min to t = 1:00
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of accurate spot HR (BPM) measurements of the investigated device, while located in front of the subject, compared to the reference device measurements.

other_outcome.time_frame: from screening until the end of study measurements, up to 1 year
other_outcome.description: Percent of subjects with device related adverse events.

intervention.description: The Neteera 130H will used to perform measurements in proximity to study participants.

study_pop.textblock: Males and females, 18 years old and above willing and able to provide an informed consent and eligible according to the eligibility criteria.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age â‰¥ 18 years
Exclusion Criteria:
- Children under the age of 18 years
- Pregnant or lactating women - as confirmed by a home pregnancy test kit
- Current irregular heart rate (e.g. Atrial fibrillation) - as assessed by a targeted physical examination during screening
- Current shortness of breath, respiratory distress, or other clinical signs of hemodynamic instability - as assessed by a targeted physical examination during screening
- Prior major surgical and/or orthopedical and/or trauma in the thorax
- Participation in an investigational trial within 30 days of the screening visit
